column1: Local Foods////Really excellent food and service.  The Egg Salad Truffle Sandwich is  amazing.  So is the Shrimp and crab .  the Tuscan kale is fantastic as is the lemongrass soup.  Frozen margaritas and the frozen lemonade are also excellent.  Lots of outside seating on a huge sunny patio and comfy booths and chairs for indoor seating too.  Very good service.   Bravo keep up the good work.
